WAP always insert the data's to Elastic Search by using Offline Runner Job.

46782dc5-8479-409c-92dc-8d8a8ac2ffe2.header: How to arise bug in Redmine Git to Wap member
46782dc5-8479-409c-92dc-8d8a8ac2ffe2.content:
1. Get Ticket Id 
From Development Story Under Custom Tab
2. Log in to Redmine

http://192.168.142.158/redmine/issues/488758

User Name : iv_gomathi.v

Password  : iv_gomathi.v

3. In redmine - search bar Paste Copied TICKET Id from Development story and Search 

4. verify the Displayed  Ticket id  in Issues Tab, Ticket id you have searched ins search bar

5. Then go to overview, Click Function , it will navigate to Issue tab

6. The click Filter, then click version option.

7. Then Click Options, Add column, Related issue to Display

8. Now Click Apply

9. Check All function, Which is related to Your Ticket(By Checking Subject, Agginess, Related issues)

10. Open the related Function

11. Click report Bug Option

12. By using Template (How to rise Bug Template)

13. Set severity of Bug

3d97b9ce-34ea-41d8-b754-7b829c1bc0f7.content:
[Chennai Integration test] - File uploading error status in Direct Debit Details screen

【Overview(概要)】
Error status is not displayed in Direct Debit Details screen while uploading JPG file.

【Operation to reproduce(再現手順)】
1.Navigate to Menu>AC>Business Common>Bank Account Management
2.Click side menu Direct Debit Details
3.Click upload button in Direct Debit Details screen
4.Select the FB data file"Test data account num.jpg"


【Expected behavior(期待する動作)】
File upload status "Error in upload" should be displayed 

【Actual behavior(実際の動作)】
File upload status "Complete" is displayed

【Occurred conditions(発生条件)】
File uploading status check

[URL]
https://scmstg2-develop.hue.worksap.com/ac-bankaccount/hue/ac/bankaccount/portal/

[Screen Name]
Bank Account Management

[UserId/Pass]
hue-root/hue-r00t

[Browser]
IE11

# 632608 - Confirmaton for the table name to add an extra field in interface to import bank account information -  Spec confirmation
DTO infomation  -  EmpExpenseBankAccountDto Now it in RDB

EmpExpenseBankAccountDto is in rdb now, and We need to add integer field "bankAccountUsageStatus" - int (Datatype) in "com_ac_emp_expense_bank_account_mst" table now.

#804179 : Needed table entry infornation to the existing interface Employee Expense Bank Account 
Is we need to enter integer value in bankAccountUsageStatus column in the csv file?

Kindly provide information about the type of data to be entered in the csv file for the field bankAccountUsageStatus.
-----------------------------------------------------------------
SubsystemNmTextId - Refund Management_Accountant can register debit bank account by Input Engine
There is already an interface for this , we need to edit it so that user can add one more field for `Bank Account Usage Status`
Following is the existing interface
----------Special Requirement------------------------------
Objective
There is already interface to import bank account information.
However, the bank account can be used for Expense, or Refund.
We need to differentiate the usage of the bank account.
Thus, when importing bank account info from interface, we need to add en extra field to track the bank account usage

Specifications
After function 
Err:510
Is implemented.
There would be a new field in
 EmpExpenseBankAccountDto

Assume that field is called 
BankAccountUsage

if BankAccountUsage == 1, the bank account is for expense
if BankAccountUsage == 2, the bank account is for refund
3 both
As per spec

Thus in our current interface for 
Employee Expense Bank Account
We should allow accountant to import the "BankAccountUsage" data as well.

How to test
1/ Ensure BankAccountUsage data is correctly imported to EmpExpenseBankAccountDto.
-------------------------------------------------------------

Are all the checkpoints in UI/UX checklist, Design checklist for Chennai & Hyouka checklist executed ?
Are all the spec changes updated & highlighted in Test case documents with proper comments and the Revision history sheet is updated accordingly ?
Are all the Test case documents which are applicable for the epic executed ?
Are all the CH bugs closed and is the CH Execution task closed with proper comments by Dev LL ?
Is the test data provided in indus environment for the screen sufficient and diverse ?
Is the complete Screen Flow video recorded in IE 11 browser for both EN and JA locale & committed in the corresponding GIT path ?
Are UI Review, Functional Review and Scenario review tickets closed ?
Are Clover scripts provided for all the Test cases and Checklist points ?
Are all the Spec Confirmation tickets raised in CH Execution phase closed ?
Are all the Test case documents updated with test results & committed in the corresponding GIT path ?
Is the Regression checklist executed (Applicable only for iteration and enhancement epics) ?
Are all the spec changes, testcase modifications and business flow of the screen explained in the Demo meeting ?

-----------------------------------------------
Vaibhav San,

Over View:
Clarification regarding the Default path displayed on Expens management - AcExpenseShortTrans.Standard and Setting page

Clarification :
Records are cretaed by Commuter Pass Master Maintenance HOR Screen. We have created records for Employees not for users.
Created records are registered in "CommuterPassDto", "CommuterPassSummaryDto" based on acEmpId and start date.

Then we have to check "Commute Route" displayed in Expense Management Setting screen and Transportation Expense Application Widget.

Query :
1. In Both screen, Default Commute Route default path should be displayed (If it has more than History).
2. There is any relation between user login and Employee that we have registered in Commuter Pass Master Maintenance HOR Screen.

Refer Attached document : commuterPass Master Maintenance - Clarification.ods

Kindly clarify above query ASAP.
It will be helpful for us to complete the testcase on time.

Thank you.

3778d76c-1058-4fb4-8843-c9c45dee53d6.content:
Vaibhav san,

Thank you for the reply and confirmation

> This understanding is Correct
 Ok.

Consider Below Scenario regarding history and default path: 
For History Information for [ Employee 1025 - Commuter Path Route As below ]
Sep 1, 2018 ~ Sep 10, 2018 - Default route is Mumbai - Pune
Sep 11, 2018 ~ Sep 20, 2018 - Default route is Chennai - Bengaluru
Sep 21, 2018 ~ ------      - Default route is Hyderabad - Chennai.

1. Now, on which basic Default route is displayed on  Expense management - AcExpenseShortTrans.Standard Application Screen and Portal Setting page.
Because each history maintain different path as Default route. 

Kindly clarify above query ASAP.

Thank you.


Vaibhav San,

Over View:
Clarification regarding the Default "Commute Route Path" displayed on Expens management - AcExpenseShortTrans.Standard Application Screen and Portal Setting page

Records are created by Commuter Pass Master Maintenance HOR Screen. We have created records for Employees not for users.
Created records are registered in "CommuterPassDto", "CommuterPassSummaryDto" based on acEmpId and start date.

Then we have to check "Commute Route" displayed in Expense Management Setting screen and Transportation Expense Application Widget.

Query :
1. In Both screen, Default Commute Route default path should be displayed (If it has more than History).
2. There is any relation between user login and Employee that we have registered in Commuter Pass Master Maintenance HOR Screen.

Refer Attached document : commuterPass Master Maintenance - Clarification.ods

Kindly clarify above query ASAP.
It will be helpful for us to complete the testcase on time.

Thank you.
